bibl.title: Banganarti Nativity: Enkolpion with Scene of the Birth of Jesus from House BA/2015 in Banganarti.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Slate enkolpion engraved with the Nativity scene found in one of the dwellings to the east of the Upper Church in Banganarti. The reverse is inscribed with the names of the three main protagonists of the scene carved on the obverse. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Bogdan Żurawski, Banganarti Nativity: Enkolpion with Scene of the Birth of Jesus from House BA/2015 in Banganarti.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 647-657, 2 figg.

Slate enkolpion engraved with the Nativity scene found in one of the dwellings to the east of the Upper Church in Banganarti. The reverse is inscribed with the names of the three main protagonists of the scene carved on the obverse. - Avec résumé en anglais.
